Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Enio
Reviews.Content: All products very good. Only tripod and bag are low quality. A Canon EOS REbel T3i is excellent.I recommend. I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Well done!
Reviews.Author: Kerry VanDusen
Reviews.Content: This whole package was full of quality items! Although we expected the camera and lenses to be quality because we knew exactly what we wanted when picking out a camera, we weren't sure how the other items in the box would rate. Good news: everything was great! We couldn't be happier with this package! If I had to make one tiny complaint, it would be how long it took to get the package delivered to me. The shipping offered was 3-5 business days. It took them 3 full business days to process the order before shipping it out and then it took 7 full business days (not including the day it actually left their warehouse) to get it to me. If they had offered 7-12 business days for delivery I still would have ordered it, but they didn't, they offered 3-5. So, that was a little disappointing but not a deal killer. All in all, a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: NIKKI G.
Reviews.Content: So happy with this camera, very easy to use, I was a bit intimidated at first but I think anyone could capture amazing photos with such a great product!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This bundle is a good deal. The camera works perfectly and the lens are great. I like this bundle because both lens have image stabilization. I haven't used the macro and 2x lens and I considered them fillers. The 32gb card allows 3000 - 4000 pictures. The bag is cheap but I expected that. I bought a larger bag and use the one in the bundle to hold the camera on day trips. That is about all it is useful for to me. I SD card holder is neat but I don't have need for multiple cards. Most laptops have card readers, so the one in the bundle is not needed for me.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Gary Miller
Reviews.Content: The camera, lens and filters were all great making the deal a better buy than the camera and lens alone at other places. The other misc. pieces were not as good a quality, but ok for a starter to work with until they can upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: GavinF
Reviews.Content: For a detailed review of the camera itself I suggest reading reviews on the other T3i pages. My review will stick to the accessories.First- If you do have have experience shooting with a SRL I do not recommend buying this camera right before a vacation or big event. You will need time to learn the functions of the camera to take decent shots and a lot more time to take full advantage of the camera. If you are in a time crunch I suggest sticking with a point in shoot.-  I'm pleased with the three lens filters because like all filters they provide the actual lens with a measure of protection from scratches and dust. Without thinking I threw my last camera inside my backpack and scratched the lens. Big mistake.-  I'm very pleased with the image stabilization of each of the lenses. I'm happy I sacrificed focal length for IS.-  The macro/wide angle and telephoto lens accessories are great. These accessories sometimes visibly distort the pictures but for the price I'm extremely pleased. I knew I wanted to occasionally shoot macro but I didn't want to splurge a few hundred dollars on a macro lens. Plus, the camera has a crop sensor so the camera provides a slight magnification to all the photos; the macro lens allows pictures to be taken in cramped places- like taking a picture of a hotel room. (made by Vivitar).-  The SD card reader did not work for me but that could be a problem with my computer. The camera does have HDMI and a/v outputs so the card reader shouldn't be necessary for anyone.-  Unlike some of the other reviewers, I like the carrying bag. It's entirely padded so I put the carrying bag inside my backpack and I don't worry about small bumps or dirt.-  I never saw the tripod because a friend ditched it to save room when traveling from the US to Africa to bring me the camera. However, with enough effort, the mini tripod will work for me when I take long exposer shots. Even without the tripod this set is a great value.-  32 gb SD card capacity is helpful for shooting in RAW so again, very pleased.-  The SD carrying wallet is bulky but does the job. I don't think I will ever use it.-  Extra third party battery, lens cleaning kit, car charger... all work.-  All of the accessories (I don't have the tripod) fit inside the carrying bag.-  The camera comes with a camera strap. It's alright. I never use it but when I allow someone to barrow the camera, I'm happy it's there.-  Each camera comes with a lens cap but I wish I bought extra ones with strings because I know I'm going to misplace them.Not including the two lenses, I would have happily paid $50 for the accessories. The package has everything you need to start shooting. I also separately bought a remote (works well).

Reviews.Title: This is a great starter camera
Reviews.Author: alicia sheeks
Reviews.Content: I was super impressed with everything except for the bag that it came with. It is not big enough for all of the equipment that came with this bundle. This was a great buy and the price was right for me. I love shooting with this and it takes amazing pictures. I am glad that I was able to get the warranty with it. The one thing that I did have happen is when it came, there is a small package that included the cleaning stuff for the camera, well I didn't open it till yesterday to use the tabletop tripod in it and the entire bottle of solution had leaked out and everything in it was molded and ruined, so I will be contacting you guys about this issue. I am so happy to have purchased this bundle and the shipping was fast! I needed it asap and I got it! Thanks so much for this great product! I am sure that I will keep checking back for some more great deals!

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: DeniseW
Reviews.Content: I love the camera!  Have only used a few of the other things that came in the "set" but as I have not had a camera with all the gadgets before I chose to get the set.  I probably could have saved some money with getting just the camera and the lens.

Reviews.Title: great camera, great purchase!
Reviews.Author: deeloz
Reviews.Content: this camera is the greatest thing! im not a photographer but i always wanted to have a great camera. after having a bunch of small digital cameras and 1 other SLR, this camera is the best. the bundle itslef i think is way too much for someone that is not a photographer, but overall is great. the tripod is good, its great for when we take family pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice package
Reviews.Author: Furqan
Reviews.Content: Overall nice camera to play with. Accessories are of low quality as expected. But the lenses and camera is quite good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: markaf
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with the camera and accessories i purchased. Great deal, great service!!! Would reccomend this package to anyone that wants a great value.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Dan W.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Rebel package as a Christmas present for me (from my wife).  :)  Being that it is still winter, I haven't had a chance to use it a lot.  However given the little I have used it (200 to 300 shots), I am very happy with the performance and quality.  I plan to give it a real work out this spring and summer!

Reviews.Title: great bundle
Reviews.Author: gregory her
Reviews.Content: would recommend to others for it was a great product and enjoyed using it very much. bought it for my wife's bday and she uses it all the time now.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Brian Wallin
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my Nikon N70. Have to learn all the bells and whistles but i think it will ring a butiful tune.

Reviews.Title: shipping was great
Reviews.Author: Sue P.
Reviews.Content: Can't review product yet. Haven't had time to do more than open the box. I'm so amazed though because I just ordered this yesterday and it arrived today. Wow!!! How great is that. Everything was packed very well. More to come about camera later.

Reviews.Title: Our first slr camera and loving it!
Reviews.Author: Len
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are of great. The spare battery and charger is useless. Haven't used it for some months and when we checked it out the battery is swollen and hardly could get it the battery slot on the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II & 55-250 IS II Lens Kit Package 6
